summary: This announcement provides additional information regarding the proposed private placement by Reservoir Link Energy Bhd (RLEB). It clarifies the utilization of proceeds based on minimum and maximum scenarios, detailing allocations for acquisition of PMSB and working capital.

utilisation_of_proceeds.use: Acquisition of 30% equity interest in Propel Maxflo Sdn Bhd (PMSB)
utilisation_of_proceeds.details: To fully fund the acquisition of PMSB, involved in oil and gas products and services.
utilisation_of_proceeds.timeframe: Within 12 months from the receipt of funds

utilisation_of_proceeds.amount: RM2.982 million (minimum scenario), RM4.408 million (maximum scenario)
utilisation_of_proceeds.details: For oil and gas services and renewable energy activities.
utilisation_of_proceeds.timeframe: Within 12 months from the receipt of funds

utilisation_of_proceeds.use: Estimated expenses for the Proposed Private Placement
utilisation_of_proceeds.details: Professional fees, regulatory fees, and other incidental expenses.
utilisation_of_proceeds.timeframe: Upon completion of the Proposed Private Placement
